author: catkaboodle

text: It makes me sad. Uematsu practically stole this song from Dragon Quest when he composed Boundless Ocean/Water World. I originally posted that this song was stolen from Final Fantasy III a few years ago when I heard it in Dragon Quest 8. But, Final Fantasy III came out in 1990 and Dragon Quest 3 came out in 1998. No wonder Dragon Quest fans have been so angry at Final Fantasy.
